segments.text: I see the children with their secretive little act, and it makes me chuckle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Theyâ€™re so innocent, yet so mischievous at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, waiting for her cookie, eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a knot of anxiety settle in my stomach at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy teeters on the edge of the stool, and I can almost hear the impending crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the woman remains blissfully unaware, her focus only on her drying plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
